rwar 0.1.0

Reference

All functions

add_gmm()

Add GMM density to an ISD

all_core_analyses()

Run and collect all core analyses

compare_isds()

Compute ISD turnover

compare_species_composition()

Compare species composition

compute_raw_sv_change()

Compute raw change from the first five to the last five years

fit_all_caps_lms()

Fit linear models to the 5 state variables for the first and last 5 years ("caps")

fit_all_timeseries_lms()

Fit linear models to the 5 state variables for the full timeseries

fit_caps_lm()

Fit a lm to the first and last 5 years ("caps")

fit_gmm()

Fit a GMM

fit_timeseries_lm()

Fit a lm to the full timeseries

get_annual_svs()

Calculate state variables for every year given ISDs

interaction_lms()

Interaction of sv change

local_null_model()

Local null model

local_null_model_wrapper()

Wrapper for local null model

percentile_score()

Calculate percentile score

pull_caps()

Pull first and last 5 years

regional_null_model()

Regional null model

regional_null_model_wrapper()

Wrapper for regional null model

ses()

Calculate standardized effect size

summarize_null_results()

Summarize actual v. null results
